Avenging Angel: R30' Aura frightens foes (DC 16 Wisdom neg; damage ends), giving Adv on ally attacks, for 1 hr/long rest
Divine Smite: After a successful melee attack, may spend a spell slot to inflict +(slot level + 1)d8 HP (maximum 5d8) radiant damage (+1d8 HP vs. undead and fiends)

Fighting Style (Dueling): +2 damage with a single, one-handed weapon
Fighting Style (Great Weapon Fighting): May reroll 1s and 2s on two-handed weapon damage
Fighting Style (Protection): May use Reaction and shield to inflict Disadv on attacks on an adjacent creature
Improved Divine Smite: Successful melee attack inflicts +1d8 HP radiant damage
Relentless Avenger: May move 15' after a successful OA
Sacred Weapon: May use Channel Divinity to give weapon +2 attack and 20' light for 1 min
Soul Of Vengeance: May use Reaction when Vow Of Enmity target attacks to attempt a melee attack
Undying Sentinel: May retain 1 HP when brought to 0 HP 1/long rest
Vow Of Enmity: R10' May use Channel Divinity to give self Adv on attacks against target for 1 min

Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Knows 2 S0 spells/May cast chosen S1 spell 1/long rest
Abjure Enemy: R60' May use Channel Divinity to halt target (DC 16 Wisdom half speed) for 1 min
Cleansing Touch: May dispel a spell effect on a touched willing creature 2/long rest
Divine Sense: R60' May discern location of celestials, fiends, and undead for 1 rd 3/long rest
Elder Champion: Regains 10 HP/rd, may cast paladin spells as a bonus action, and inflicts Disadv on saves vs. self spells on foes w/in 10' for 1 min 1/long rest
Elemental Adept (Acid): Acid spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Holy Nimbus: May emit a 30' bright light that inflicts 10 HP radiant to foes for 1 min 1/long rest
Lay On Hands: May heal 100 HP/long rest; may use 5 HP worth to cure disease or poison
Nature's Wrath: R10' May use Channel Divinity to create spectral vines that restrain target (DC 16 Dexterity or Strength neg)
Purity Of Spirit: Has a continuous Protection From Evil And Good effect
Spell Sniper: Dbl attack spell range/Spells ignore 3/4 cover/Knows an additional attack cantrip
Turn The Faithless: R30' May use Channel Divinity to make fiends and fey flee (DC 16 Wisdom neg) for 1 min
Turn The Unholy: R30' May use Channel Divinity to make fiends and undead flee (DC 16 Wisdom neg) for 1 min
